QuestData.Title: Get Back Here!
QuestData.Description: Oh, before I forget, I have something I was asked to deliver to you. A letter from one of your companions, I assume.$b$bI was made to understand that your presence was urgently required, so I took the liberty of arranging your passage.$b$bSpeak to Ginsa Arroweye just south of here when you're ready. She has a kite waiting.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Admiral Taylor is awaiting your return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Admiral Taylor in Pearlfin Village.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Admiral Taylor in Pearlfin Village.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome back, $n. I trust your journey has been insightful, particularly in regards to the layout of the land. There is still much to do before we march into battle.
